basics.name: Larry Villegas Costas
basics.label: Full Stack Web Developer
basics.summary: A Full-Stack Web Developer, based in Bolivia who enjoys tackling challenges. I invite you to take a look at the projects I've developed, and I'd love the opportunity to bring your project to life as well.

volunteer.summary: Development of team projects remotely. Pair programming whit 40+ developers from different parts of the world.
highlights: Graduated as a Full Stack Web Developer

volunteer.organization: Ministerio de Defensa del Estado Plurinacional de Bolivia
volunteer.summary: Led a teamfor 7 years, resolving administrative challenges and overseeing salarymanagement for over 15,000 individuals.

education.area: Remote Full Stack Web Development Program, Full-Time
courses: Ruby on Rails - Web Application Framework

publications.name: HTML / CSS
publications.summary: Students earn this credential after demonstrating industry standard HTML and CSS skills, achieved working on remote pair programming with teams from around the world.

publications.name: JavaScript
publications.summary: Students earn this credential after demonstrating understanding and mastery of JavaScript. During the course of this module, they build several projects using JavaScript while pair-programming remotely with an international team of software developers.

publications.name: React / Redux
publications.summary: Students earn this credential after demonstrating thorough understanding and mastery of React and Redux. Over the course of this module, students build and develop multiple projects using React and Redux, working both independently and while remotely pair-programming.

publications.name: Ruby / Databases
publications.summary: Students earn this credential after demonstrating thorough and complete understanding of Ruby and databases by building multiple projects while collaborating and pair programming remotely with developers across the world.

publications.name: Ruby on Rails
publications.summary: Students earn this credential upon demonstrating mastery of Ruby on Rails by building multiple real-world Rails applications alongside software developers from all over the world.

publications.name: Full Stack Capstone
publications.summary: Students earn this credential after demonstrating the ability to collaborate with other students in order to develop a project based on business requirements. This project consists of React & Redux frontend part and Ruby on Rails API as the backend part and is presented to an external evaluator. Over the course of this module module, students use all technical and professional skills gained in the entire Program.

publications.name: Full Stack Web Development
publications.summary: Students earn this credential after working through 1500+ hours of remote pair programming, learning to code with teams from around the world.

projects.name: Fast Land Racers
projects.description: Fast-Lane-Racer is a car booking website that enables users to effortlessly book rides and travel to their desired destinations. Users can reserve a car from the available options by providing the date and city, ensuring a seamless and reliable car booking experience.
highlights: Developed a full-stack web application using Ruby on Rails and React & Redux.

projects.name: Tesla Clone
projects.description: Tesla Clone is a replica of the Tesla website. It is a static website built using Astro, Tailwind..
highlights: Developed a static website using Astro, Tailwind, and Netlify.

projects.name: Pennywise
projects.description: Pennywise: Simplify your finances. Track expenses, set budgets, gain insights, and make informed decisions for financial freedom. Get started today!
highlights: Developed a full-stack web application using Ruby on Rails and React & Redux.

projects.name: Crypto Coinranking
projects.description: It's a powerful web application designed specifically for cryptocurrencies. Leveraging the capabilities of React and Redux, it offers comprehensive information about various digital coins.
highlights: Developed web application using React & Redux.

projects.name: The Simpsons Fans Club
projects.description: This project showcases my proficiency in JavaScript, Webpack, and Jest, along with my skills in working with JSON for reading and writing APIs.
highlights: Developed a static website using JavaScript, Webpack, and Jest.

projects.name: Catholic Music Concert
projects.description: A landing page specifically created to promote a Catholic concert. The design is intuitive and user-friendly, enabling visitors to access essential concert details such as date, time, venue, and artists quickly and easily.
highlights: Developed a static website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
